message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for your needs.  I'm asking for $14,000 to start. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $14,000 represents a fair price for its value, I understand your budget constraints. Could you meet me at $11,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. However, $11,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'd like to propose $10,000. Can you consider that?
